data.nrql: SELECT latest(cpuPercent) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET `fullHostname` WHERE `fullHostname` LIKE '%kafka-mirror%' LIMIT 100 SINCE 60 minutes ago
SELECT latest(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) FROM SystemSample TIMESERIES FACET `fullHostname` WHERE `fullHostname` LIKE '%kafka-mirror%' limit 100
SELECT latest(diskUsedPercent) FROM StorageSample TIMESERIES FACET `fullHostname`, `mountPoint` WHERE `fullHostname` LIKE '%kafka-mirror%' AND `mountPoint` = '/kafka' LIMIT 100 SINCE 60 minutes ago
SELECT latest(Value) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName`,`key:name` where label.env like '%-kafka' AND bean like '%MirrorMaker%'

presentation.title: Number of Msgs Dropped ( per process )

data.nrql: SELECT latest(`record-error-rate`),latest(`record-error-total`), latest(`record-queue-time-avg`), latest(`record-queue-time-max`),latest(`record-retry-rate`),latest(`record-retry-total`),latest(`record-send-rate`),latest(`record-send-total`),latest(`record-size-avg`),latest(`record-size-max`),latest(`records-per-request-avg`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`buffer-available-bytes`),latest(`buffer-exhausted-rate`),latest(`buffer-exhausted-total`),latest(`buffer-total-bytes`),latest(`bufferpool-wait-ratio`),latest(`bufferpool-wait-time-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`incoming-byte-rate`/1000000) as `incoming-mega-byte-rate` ,latest(`outgoing-byte-rate`/1000000) as `outgoing-mega-byte-rate` from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`connection-close-rate`),latest(`connection-close-total`),latest(`connection-count`),latest(`connection-creation-rate`),latest(`connection-creation-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`request-latency-avg`),latest(`request-latency-max`),latest(`request-rate`),latest(`request-size-avg`),latest(`request-size-max`),latest(`request-total`),latest(`requests-in-flight`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`batch-size-avg`),latest(`batch-size-max`),latest(`batch-split-rate`),latest(`batch-split-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`produce-throttle-time-max`),latest(`produce-throttle-time-avg`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%producer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`commit-latency-avg`),latest(`commit-latency-max`),latest(`commit-rate`),latest(`commit-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%consumer-coordinator-metrics%'
SELECT latest(`assigned-partitions`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName`,`key:client-id` where bean like '%consumer-coordinator-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`sync-rate`),latest(`sync-time-avg`),latest(`sync-time-max`),latest(`sync-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%consumer-coordinator-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`request-rate`),latest(`request-size-avg`),latest(`response-rate`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%consumer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`records-lag`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET `key:topic` where bean like '%consumer-fetch-manager-metrics%' and `query` like 'type=consumer-fetch-manager-metrics,client-id=*,topic=*,partition=*'

SELECT latest(`fetch-latency-avg`),latest(`fetch-size-avg`), latest(`bytes-consumed-rate`), latest(`records-consumed-rate`), latest(`record-size-avg`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName`,`key:client-id` where bean like '%consumer-fetch-manager-metrics%' and `query` like 'type=consumer-fetch-manager-metrics,client-id=*'

SELECT latest(`heartbeat-rate`),latest(`heartbeat-response-time-max`),latest(`heartbeat-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%consumer-coordinator-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`connection-close-rate`),latest(`connection-close-total`),latest(`connection-count`),latest(`connection-creation-rate`),latest(`connection-creation-total`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean like '%consumer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`incoming-byte-rate`/1000000) as `incoming-mega-byte-rate` ,latest(`outgoing-byte-rate`/1000000) as `outgoing-mega-byte-rate` from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`key:client-id` where bean like '%consumer-metrics%'

SELECT latest(`HeapMemoryUsage.Max`/1000000000) as 'HeapMemoryUsage.Max',latest(`HeapMemoryUsage.Used`/1000000000) as 'HeapMemoryUsage.Used',latest(`NonHeapMemoryUsage.Used`/1000000000) as 'NonHeapMemoryUsage.Used' from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean LIKE 'type=Memory'

SELECT latest(`CollectionCount`),latest(`CollectionTime`/1000) as 'CollectionTimeInSeconds' from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName`,`key:name` where bean LIKE 'type=GarbageCollector,name=%'
SELECT latest(`PeakThreadCount`) ,latest(`ThreadCount`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean LIKE 'type=Threading'
SELECT latest(`LoadedClassCount`) from kafkaMirrorMakerMonitoring TIMESERIES FACET host,`label.mirrorMakerProcessName` where bean LIKE 'type=ClassLoading'
